"Rare species drilling at the Undersea":
"Is the exploration of the Undersea going
smoothly? For me, things are always not
progressing as expected. But since someone
as dependable as you are around, I always
feel saved. By the way, lately I have been
receiving reports of sightings of Nove Maluda.
Although reports of rare species are few,
it is thought that these are almost accurate.
Can I again ask for your assistance?
*Target Nove Maluda of Lv.60 and higher"

"海底の探索は順調かね？
私は相変わらず思うに任せないが
キミという頼りになる存在がいるから
いつも救われている感じだ。
ところで最近、ノーヴ・マリダールの
目撃報告を受けている。
希少種ゆえ報告自体は少ないのだが
ほぼ間違いないと思われるのだ。
またキミの力を貸してもらえないだろうか？
※Lv.60以上のノーヴ・マリダールが対象"
